dataset_id: Siberian Boreal Forest Aboveground Biomass and Fire Scar Maps, Russia, 1969-2007
title: Siberian Boreal Forest Aboveground Biomass and Fire Scar Maps, Russia, 1969-2007
summary: This data set provides 30-meter resolution mapped estimates of Cajander larch (Larix cajanderi) aboveground biomass (AGB), circa 2007, and a map of burn perimeters for 116 forest fires that occurred from 1966-2007. The data cover ~100,000 km2 of the Kolyma River Basin in northeastern Siberia, Sakha Republic, Russia.
